content: inspired by the cute little hens you can raise on your farm in the game stardew valley i designed this pattern to make my own chickens it s somewhat intermediate since there s some fiddly bits but it s pretty straightforward finished chickens are about 4 tall depending on your gauge and such materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn in body colour cream or tan yellow and red 3 0mm and 3 5mm hooks 8mm safety eyes black stuffing
